Montecarlo methods refer to class of algorithms which which use randomness to give an estimate.
$$\alpha=\int_{0}^{1}f(x)dx$$
$$\hat{\alpha_n}=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}f(u_i)$$
